pages.text: $(li)Badlands are a biome composed mosly of Red Sand and Terracota and can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Despite them being a desert place without much life, you can find some vegetation, such as $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cactus)Cactus$(/l), Dead Bushes and, rarely, dirt areas with Yucca, Spruce, Oak and Dark Oak trees.

$(li)There are even animals that can withstand this harsh environment. Because life finds a way. You can find $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunners$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/emu)Emus$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/sunbird)Sunbirds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/kangaroo)Kangaroo$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/rattlesnake)Rattlesnakes$(/l)$(br)$(li)Dangerous creatures such as the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/husk)Husk$(/l) can be found in this biome too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the word $(l)Badlands$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
